metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23480 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
xrdp is an open source project which provides a graphical login to remotemachines using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). xrdp < v0.9.21contain a buffer over flow in devredir_proc_client_devlist_announce_req()function. There are no known workarounds for this issue. Users are advisedto upgrade.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xrdp - 0.9.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xrdp package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.12-1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
